title: Radiation
content:
Newsbreaker: fukushima fallout and rise in infants deaths on west coast Joseph Mangano is the Executive Director of the... <!--more--> Radiation and Public Health Project â€“ a nonprofit organization founded by scientists and physicians to understand the relationships between low level nuclear radiation and public health and the risks of diseases such as cancer and damage to newborns.
Joe has published numerous articles and letters in medical and other journals in addition to books, including Low Level Radiation and Immune System Disorders: An Atomic Era Legacy.
There he examines the connection between radiation exposure and current widespread health problems.
www.Radiation.org
